summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 regarding the scheduling and logistics for Ghislaine Maxwell's review of sensitive discovery materials at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). It involves coordination between a prosecutor, FBI agents, and Maxwell's defense attorney, with explicit instructions that FBI agents are not to speak with Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused individual who is to review sensitive discovery materials at the MDC while represented by counsel.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Coordinates the logistics for Maxwell's discovery review, informs MDC legal counsel, and reminds FBI agents not to speak with Maxwell.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI - New York - SO-9
persons.context: One of the FBI agents tasked with bringing a secure laptop to the MDC for Maxwell's discovery review and indicates availability for scheduling.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: The MDC official who will meet with the FBI agents to discuss logistics for Maxwell's discovery review session.

connections.person2: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: Prosecutor is coordinating the legal process (discovery review) for the defendant, Maxwell.

connections.person2: Special Agent FBI - New York - SO-9
connections.description: FBI agent is facilitating the defendant's access to discovery materials under strict non-communication rules.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.person2: Special Agent FBI - New York - SO-9
connections.description: Prosecutor is giving instructions and coordinating scheduling with the FBI agent for a case-related procedure.

events.title: Scheduled Discovery Review Meeting (Cancelled)
events.description: A meeting was scheduled for Ghislaine Maxwell to review discovery materials at the MDC with her attorney present, but was cancelled by her attorney.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI - New York - SO-9

events.title: Logistics Coordination for Discovery Review
events.description: Prosecutor informs FBI agents and MDC counsel about the plan for Maxwell to review discovery from 8am to 3pm using a secure laptop, with instructions not to speak to her.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
Special Agent FBI - New York - SO-9

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was reviewing sensitive discovery materials in October 2020 while in custody at the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The FBI was explicitly instructed not to speak with Maxwell during these review sessions because she was represented by counsel.
Logistics involved FBI agents bringing a secure laptop to the MDC and coordinating with the facility's Captain.
A scheduled meeting for October 20, 2020, was cancelled last minute by Maxwell's defense attorney, requiring rescheduling.
